Docs.summary: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is performed on the editor.

remarks.para: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is performed on the editor.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnEditorAction(class Android.Widget.TextView v, valuetype Android.Views.InputMethods.ImeAction actionId, class Android.Views.KeyEvent e) cil managed
abstract member OnEditorAction : Android.Widget.TextView * Android.Views.InputMethods.ImeAction * Android.Views.KeyEvent -> bool

Docs.param: If triggered by an enter key, this is the event; otherwise, this is null.

Identifier of the action. This will be either the identifier you supplied, or EditorInfo#IME_NULL EditorInfo.IME_NULL if being called due to the enter key being pressed. Starting from Android 14, the action identifier will also be included when triggered by an enter key if the input is constrained to a single line.
If triggered by an enter key, this is the event; otherwise, this is null.
Docs.summary: Called when an action is being performed.
Docs.returns: Return true if you have consumed the action, else false.

remarks.para: Called when an action is being performed.
